ygData.subject: Some notes
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been skipping ahead of my scenarios and I have finished the ending - exactly the way I had intended since I started. I am working on my level 200 cleric

I have been skipping ahead of my scenarios and I have finished the 
ending - exactly the way I had intended since I started.

I am working on my level 200 cleric vs level 150 archmage and I have 
been noticing a consistent problem:  I have been having trouble 
keeping my own team alive - that is a team composed of a experience 
level 500 mage or experience level 250 archmage - if they escaped the 
barrier of doors and trees I placed them in.  I am strongly inclined 
to place them in a walled-area with no hope of participating in the 
battle for their own protection.

I would also like to make a side note: archmages are more inclined to 
summon images/fire elementals than clerics are to raise 
skeletons/ghosts.
